function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Coronavirus attacks the respiratory tract and infects humans, mammals, and birds, causing mild to severe symptoms.","Impact":"Severe cases can lead to difficulty in breathing and death, contributing to a public health emergency.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict containment measures, vaccination programs, and public health education.","Technologies":"PCR testing, contact tracing apps, personal protective equipment (PPE) manufacturing.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and animal handlers.","Owner":"Health ministries, public health organizations, and research institutions."},{"Description":"COVID-19 has fast spread globally, causing a Public Health Emergency of International Concern.","Impact":"High infection rates and death toll, leading to overwhelmed healthcare systems and economic disruptions.","Mitigation":"Enforcing travel restrictions, quarantine protocols, and widespread testing and contact tracing.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote working technologies, and surveillance systems.","People":"Global population, travelers, and frontline healthcare workers.","Owner":"Governments, international health organizations, and private sector."},{"Description":"No standard vaccine or cure for COVID-19.","Impact":"Continued threat of widespread infections and high mortality rates.","Mitigation":"Investing in vaccine development, antiviral treatments, and public health measures.","Technologies":"Vaccine development platforms, antiviral drug discovery tools, and genomic sequencing.","People":"Global population, vulnerable individuals, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research institutions, and global health organizations."}]}
